item.description:
Hi! The next Meetup for the Hartford Russian Language Group will be on Tuesday January 8th at 7:00 and we will continue to meet on the second Tuesday of each month from here on out.

We have held the last three meetings in the back meeting room at the Wood-n-Tap, 99 Sisson Ave, Hartford, CT. The Wood-n-Tap is a nice, casual place with good food. As before, I have not arranged for any formal meal, we can simply order off the menu as we please.

Our first meetings have been basically informal events. Most of our last meeting was conducted in Russian, but do not let that discourage you if you are a beginner like me, simply bring along a dictionary and jump right in.

We have been growing slowly each month and hope to see some new faces this month!

I look forward to meeting as many of you as possible next week!

Andrew

PS. My email is anderson06143@yahoo.com and the website for the Wood-n-Tap is www.woodntap.com

group.name: The Hartford Russian Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Hartford Russian Language January Meetup
